title: Hambroc
content:
I have started this font yesterday   
and already seems i will have a tough time.   
i never really designed a font, only hundreds   
of illustrations of unfinished ideas
author: tsoler

comments.content:
very nice work, Christos! although it does seem familiar   
in some way, I think it will find a place of its own.   
   
I really like the 'O' in line D, but I think the splintered   
curves introduce a characteristic not present   
elsewhere. I'd go with line A.   
   
you might also want to try incorporating a curve similar   
to the 'B', 'R', and 'K' into one side or both of the 'M'. I'm   
not quite sure how that would work, but it's a thought.

i agree with plain clothes, sport dressing and stuff   
i am pro-A, although B looks nice too (however it looks smaller than the other caps, so you should increase the size by 4%(it's that theory about circles looking smaller to a rectangle, while they both have the same height))   
C is dull and D is very nice, but as p\*c suggested, it's another font   
   
carry on
